title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification
description: Received the JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures certification from freeCodeCamp. Completed 25 hands-on JavaScript projects covering objects, functions, the DOM, object-oriented programming, APIs, and more.

title: Penetration Tester Certification (PJPT)
description: Preparing for the TCM-Security Practical Junior Penetration Tester (PJPT) certification to validate offensive security proficiency through hands-on exploitation of networks, web applications, and Active Directory in a controlled lab environment.
